products.name: Shirt
products.description: Get it quickly before cr1tikal and Andrew W.K. buy out the entire stock.

products.name: Socks
products.description: Every sock you buy is but a poor lost soul looking for its eventual resting place in some unreachable dark chasm behind the dryer.

products.name: Shorts
products.description: A pair of pants that fell on hard times.

products.name: Record A
products.description: Get the self-titled debut album from South Florida's hottest new act, Vinyl Record PSD Mockup.

products.name: Record B
products.description: This limited edition record was custom-pressed in the shape of the lead singer's perfectly circular head.

products.name: Record C
products.description: Playing this record at 45 RPM will cause the holographic foil label to project a three-dimensional image of our refund policy.

products.name: Green Duck
products.description: It's said they're good listeners when it comes to debugging.

products.name: Blue Duck (rare)
products.description: We were only able to manufacture a very limited run of these little fellows, and we've had to sell them at an exorbitant price. This is what the blue paint shortage has done to the economy.

products.name: Yellow Duck
products.description: It's hard to beat the classic yellow. Perfect for bathtime, or spilling from cargo ships in the northern Pacific and drifting in the sea for 20 years.
